about.header_subtitle: Since 2008, the address of quality and trust.
about.description: Since 2008, as Tekno Alümil, we have been inspired by aluminum, combining durability and aesthetics in everything from doors to windows, garage doors to custom designs. We build trust by placing quality and customer satisfaction at the center of our work.

qualities.description: We bring your home and workplace together with long-lasting and superior quality aluminum solutions.

qualities.title: Expert Team
qualities.description: Our experienced team is here for you on every project, providing tailored solutions to your needs.

qualities.title: Customer Focused
qualities.description: You are always our priority. We work with a service approach that exceeds your expectations.

qualities.title: Aesthetics and Durability
qualities.description: With our products that combine modern design and durability, we ensure satisfaction that lasts for years.

founder_section.title: Selçuk Elibol
founder_section.description: The founder of Tekno Alümil, Selçuk Elibol, offers innovative solutions with over 20 years of industry experience and a customer-focused vision.
